entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 9:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: 1.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 in a few localities early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
